channel.title: Help with npcs
channel.description: Ok i made my own private serve on my hamachi and all i want to do is add an npc and not hit a 0 and kill it i want it to have hp and fight back like the guards do in varrock...someone pleeeaaassse help me and be descriptive because im a noob to moparscape

item.title: Help with npcs
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“eat an emo, post:3, topic:144913”]you did but where is npc.cfg and where is all the other files you talking about[br][size=1]Posted on: September 19, 2007, 08:01:05 PM[/size][hr]do you have any code i can replace anything with?[/quote]There is no code, just write it up very simply yourself. Search for your Config (.CFG) files that contain the needed information, add a line or two, and you’re finished.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with npcs
item.dc:creator: @eat_an_emo eat an emo
item.description:
@eat_an_emo wrote:

you did but where is npc.cfg and where is all the other files you talking about[br][size=1]Posted on: September 19, 2007, 08:01:05 PM[/size][hr]do you have any code i can replace anything with?

item.title: Help with npcs
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

To get it to have HP (and most likely fight back), go to NPC.cfg and change what you need there.

To add an npc, add a line to autospawn.cfg

Hope I helped.

Read full topic
